title: 2010 MacBook Air 11" erractic behavior.
message: This computer will freeze or restart. Tried multiple SSD's. No change. See picture for ASD details. Not a spill. Any idea where to go with something like this?

title: 2010 MacBook Air 11" erractic behavior.
message: Just fails because of a wrong drive type, probably has nothing to do with the freezing/rebooting issue. Boot from USB and see if issue remains. These are <$100 boards so no use in putting much time into.
